net.proteusframework.ui.miwt.data

Class ColumnModelImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.proteusframework.ui.miwt.data.ColumnModelImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.beans.PropertyChangeListener, java.util.EventListener, ColumnModel

    public class ColumnModelImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements ColumnModel, java.beans.PropertyChangeListener
    An implementation of ColumnModel. There should be very little need to create another implementation.
    Author:
    Pat B. Double (double@i2rd.com)

        public boolean isCompatible(ColumnModel model)
        Description copied from interface: ColumnModel

        Specified by:
        isCompatible in interface ColumnModel
        Parameters:
        model - the model.
        Returns:
